H0.text: A hafiz is a person who has memorized what book. Bible

H1.text: A hafiz is a person who has memorized what book. Torah

H2.text: A hafiz is a person who has memorized what book. Mahabharata

H3.text: A hafiz is a person who has memorized what book. Qran

A4.text: Someone who has memorized the entire Quran is called a hafiz.

A5.text: Those who memorized the entire Quran were honored with the title of hafiz.
